Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning
Juan Soto launched a go-ahead homer in the sixth for the Yankees
Darion Blanco stole third base and scored on Jake Cousins’ wild pitch
Austin Wells tied it with a sacrifice fly
Salvador Perez hit a tying sacrifice fly off Clay Holmes in the seventh and started an impressive double play to end the bottom half
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles lost 5-3 in 10 innings at Fenway Park when Tyler O’Neill hit a walk-off homer for Boston
Salvador Perez made an impressive double play to cut down Anthony Volpe at the plate
